name: nextjs-deepv-content
description: Content repository for DeepV Code technical articles

scripts.validate-all: npm run validate && npm run validate-index
scripts.workflow: npm run convert && npm run validate-all && npm run promote
scripts.update-schemas: curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/thaddeus-git/nextjs-deepv-docs/main/config/content-schema.json > content-schema.json && curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/thaddeus-git/nextjs-deepv-docs/main/config/content-templates.json > config/content-templates.json && curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/thaddeus-git/nextjs-deepv-docs/main/config/article-index-schema.json > config/article-index-schema.json && curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/thaddeus-git/nextjs-deepv-docs/main/scripts/validate-content.js > validate-content.js && curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/thaddeus-git/nextjs-deepv-docs/main/scripts/validate-article-index.js > validate-article-index.js
